trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>evento é gerado quando um botão dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe fornecer um método de processamento de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada sempre que este evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo gera também outros eventos especializados quando determinados botões são clicados (botões com o `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Eliminar", "Atualizar" e "Página", por exemplo).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar um destes botões, deve considerar a processar um dos eventos especializados fornecidos pelo controlo (tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: Foi transmitido um objeto de GridViewCommandEventArgs para o método de processamento de eventos, que lhe permite determinar o nome de comando e o argumento do comando do botão clicado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o nome de comando e o argumento do comando, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the button control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode aceder o controlo de botão que originou o evento utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de GridViewCommandEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified source of the command and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> utilizando a fonte especificada dos argumentos de comando e eventos de classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| O valor da propriedade do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>o `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| O valor da propriedade do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>o `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O objeto incluído no `commandSource` parâmetro. | > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo quando gerar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified row, source of the command, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> utilizando a linha especificada, a origem do comando e os argumentos de eventos de classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| O valor da propriedade do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>o `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| O valor da propriedade do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>o `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O objeto incluído no `commandSource` parâmetro. | > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo quando gerar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row containing the button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto que representa a linha com o botão.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade CommandSource para aceder às propriedades do objeto que representa a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: In the case of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> object, the source of the command is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that contains the button clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Em case de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>objeto, a origem do comando é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo que contém o botão clicado pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A instance of the <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> classe que representa a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo processou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: Defina esta propriedade como `true` o processador de eventos para especificar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo não deve processar o evento porque são processamento-lo no seu código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o código de evento vinculados a dados foi ignorado ou foi concluída; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
